properties.entry: SELECT COMPANY_NUM, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ADDRESS,company_picture FROM COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_NUM =?

SELECT COMPANY_NUM,COMPANY_NAME,COMPANY_PICTURE, SCORE FROM COMPANY JOIN(SELECT COMPANY_NUM, NVL(AVG(SCORE),0) SCORE FROM REVIEW RIGHT JOIN COMPANY USING (COMPANY_NUM) GROUP BY COMPANY_NUM ORDER BY SCORE DESC) USING(COMPANY_NUM)
